sentences: Helio Alves (born 1966) is a jazz pianist and son of pianists.
He has collaborated for many years with Claudio Roditi, including on the Grammy nominated Brazilliance X4 (2007).
In 2003 he was pianist on the Grammy-winning album of Obrigado Brasil by Yo Yo Ma, Big Band by Joe Henderson, and Brazilian Dreams by Paquito D'Rivera.
2012 Samba Jazz - Jazz SambaWith Carol Fredett
2014 No Sad Songs for MeWith Joe Henderson
2006 Walking with My BassWith John Pizzarelli
2012 Live in Berkeley, Airto Moreira, Flora Purim
